body_html:
@tgirgin23 I also compiled pytorch from source with CUDA 9.0 + CUDNN 7 and V100, but suffered from a slow start issue (the GPU starts very slow in the first time). Did you run into similar problem?

My pytorch is 0.3.0 and the it's not AWS though. I tried the most recent version but still the same.
